columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the table.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the table.

columns.name: table_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the table.

columns.name: creation_date_time
columns.description: The date and time when the table was created.

columns.name: table_class
columns.description: The table class of the specified table. Valid values are STANDARD and STANDARD_INFREQUENT_ACCESS.

columns.name: table_status
columns.description: The current state of the table.

columns.name: billing_mode
columns.description: Controls how AWS charges for read and write throughput and manage capacity.

columns.name: item_count
columns.description: Number of items in the table. Note that this is an approximate value.

columns.name: global_table_version
columns.description: Represents the version of global tables (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/amazondynamodb/latest/developerguide/GlobalTables.html) in use, if the table is replicated across AWS Regions.

columns.name: read_capacity
columns.description: The maximum number of strongly consistent reads consumed per second before DynamoDB returns a ThrottlingException.

columns.name: write_capacity
columns.description: The maximum number of writes consumed per second before DynamoDB returns a ThrottlingException.

columns.name: latest_stream_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the latest stream for this table.

columns.name: latest_stream_label
columns.description: A timestamp, in ISO 8601 format, for this stream.

columns.name: table_size_bytes
columns.description: Size of the table in bytes. Note that this is an approximate value.

columns.name: archival_summary
columns.description: Contains information about the table archive.

columns.name: attribute_definitions
columns.description: An array of AttributeDefinition objects. Each of these objects describes one attribute in the table and index key schema.

columns.name: key_schema
columns.description: The primary key structure for the table.

columns.name: sse_description
columns.description: The description of the server-side encryption status on the specified table.

columns.name: deletion_protection_enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether deletion protection is enabled (true) or disabled (false) on the table.

columns.name: continuous_backups_status
columns.description: The continuous backups status of the table. ContinuousBackupsStatus can be one of the following states: ENABLED, DISABLED.

columns.name: streaming_destination
columns.description: Provides information about the status of Kinesis streaming.

columns.name: point_in_time_recovery_description
columns.description: The description of the point in time recovery settings applied to the table.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the table.
